purpleculture_pinyin:
fěi
surname Fei; phonetic fei or fi; elegant; phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
фамилия Фэй; фонетические фэй или фи; элегантный; фи (греческая буква, φ)
rtega_mnemonic:
斐斐RSgraceful, elegant, beautiful
  • cultured 文 view on birds 非: graceful, elegant and beautiful animals
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 非 indicates the sound; 文 (culture) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
斐然 [ fěi rán ]: (literary) remarkable; brilliant
斐济 [ fěi jì ]: Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
斐理伯 [ fěi lǐ bó ]: Philip
斐迪南 [ fěi dí nán ]: Ferdinand (name)
拉斐尔 [ lā fěi ěr ]: Raphael
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 非 [ fēi ] not, negative, non-; to oppose
    • 文 [ wén ] culture, literature, writing
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Criminal writing is always patterned. That is to say, there is a pattern to it, lots of ARGS and GONNA STAB YAs, but it's also patterned beautifully, with a collage of cut out letters.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Can you see the patterns in the writing this criminal did? It looks like a quilt or some plaid. It's almost beautiful, the way those death threats are arranged!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you look closer at the patterned writing you realize that it forms the shape of an eagle (い). The most American bird of them all! Maybe this guy isn't a criminal after all!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture an eagle patterned out of cut out letters. What the words say isn't important (though it is asking for a ransom on your grandma), but the underlying image is gorgeous.
Ru_Notes:
Используется почти исключительно в производных слова 甲斐 (польза, толк), однако в именах имеет значение "красивый, узорный".
Фонетик: 非 (あらず、ヒ не-).
Сравни: 綺 (あや、キ красивый).
Ru_Words:
甲斐かい
  • [хороший] результат; эффект; польза; толк
Ru_trainchinese: fěi: (прил) (о литературном таланте) поразительный, блестящий
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the mistake (非) in the literature (文) is beautiful

斐字的基本解释

斐
fēi
有文彩的：斐然（ａ．有文彩的样子，如“斐斐成章”；ｂ．显著，如“成绩斐斐”）。

斐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fěi］
［《廣韻》敷尾切，上尾，敷。］
(1)有文彩貌。
(2)发愤貌。狂放貌。参见“斐然”。
(3)穿凿妄作貌。参见“斐然”。
(4)犹翩然。参见“斐然”、“斐然嚮風”。
[②]［fēi］
［《集韻》匪微切，平微，非。］
姓。春秋时晋国有斐豹。见《左传·襄公二十三年》。

斐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【文字部】　斐； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页477第10
【唐韻】【正韻】敷尾切【集韻】【韻會】妃尾切，?音菲。【說文】分別文也。易曰：君子豹變，其文斐也。◎按今易革卦，斐作蔚。　又【詩·小雅】萋兮斐兮，成是貝錦。【傳】萋斐，文章相錯也。【朱傳】小文之貌。又同匪。【詩·衞風】有匪君子。【大學】作斐。　又【集韻】匪微切，音非。姓也。【左傳·襄二十三年】初斐豹隷也。　又逋眉切，音悲。義同。

斐字的源字形

斐字的起名意思

：指有文彩的，有突出成绩的。指有文彩或文彩鲜明。

Fiji
Basic explanation of words
Fiji
fēi
Those with writing and coloring: Feiran (a. The appearance of writing and coloring, such as "Fei Fei Cheng Zhang"; b. Remarkable, such as "Achievement and Fei Fei").
Fiji
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fěi］
["Guangyun" apply tail cut, upper tail, apply. ]
(1) There is a literary and colorful appearance.
(2) Be angry. Wild-looking. See "Fei Ran".
(3) Make a fool of yourself. See "Fei Ran".
(4) Still flamboyant. See "Fei Ran", "Fei Ran Xiang Feng".
[②] [fēi]
["Jiyun" bandits are slightly cut, flat, non-performing. ]
name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, the Jin Dynasty Fei Leopard. See "Twenty-Three Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xianggong".
Fiji
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Writing Department] 　fei; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 477-10
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Put the tail cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Concubine tail cut,? Yin Fei. [Said Wen] Separate articles. Yi said: The gentleman and the leopard change, and his Wenfei is also. ◎According to the hexagram of Yi Ge today, Fei Zuo Wei.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] Yu Xi Fei Xi, become Bei Jin. [Biography] Lin Fei, the article is also wrong. [Zhu Chuan] Xiaowen's appearance. Same bandit again. 【Poetry·Weifeng】There are gangsters. [University] Zuofei.　[Jiyun] The bandit slightly cuts, the sound is not. Last name also. [Twenty-three years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang] Chu Fei Bao Li Ye.　Brows cut again, the sound is sad. The same meaning.
Fiji
Source glyph
Fiji
Name meaning
: Refers to those who have literature and color, and have outstanding achievements. Refers to textual or vivid text.
斐
形声字。文表意,甲骨文、金文像人胸前有纹饰之形,有花纹、装饰、文采等义;非(fi)表声,兼表非一般的色彩。本义是
五色相错。引申为有文彩。
有文采:~然。
~然 ~然成章
fěi
类斐斐。
隶
じは:じ..Lt..
Фиджи
Пиктофонетические символы.
Текст выражает смысл, надписи на костях оракула и надписи на человеческих сундуках имеют форму орнамента, который имеет значение узора, украшения и литературного изящества; non (fi) выражает звук, а также выражает необычный цвет.
Первоначальное значение состоит в том, что пять цветов несовместимы.
Он расширен, чтобы иметь текст.
Есть литературный талант: ~ конечно.
~ Бег ~ Бег Чэнчжан
Класс Feifei.
писец
fěi
I fěi прил.
украшенный, разукрашенный; отделанный; прекрасный, изящный, грациозный, элегантный
其文斐也 узоры на нём элегантны (изящны)
II собств.
1) fēi геогр. (сокр. вм. 斐律宾, ныне 菲律宾) Филиппины, филиппинский
2) fěi ист., геогр. Фэй (* название местности)
3) fěi, устар. fēi Фэй (фамилия)
Radicals: 非, 文  (criminal, writing)
Meaning Mnemonic
Criminal writing is always patterned. That is to say, there is a pattern to it, lots of ARGS and GONNA STAB YAs, but it's also patterned beautifully, with a collage of cut out letters.
Can you see the patterns in the writing this criminal did? It looks like a quilt or some plaid. It's almost beautiful, the way those death threats are arranged!
Reading Mnemonic
As you look closer at the patterned writing you realize that it forms the shape of an eagle (い). The most American bird of them all! Maybe this guy isn't a criminal after all!
Picture an eagle patterned out of cut out letters. What the words say isn't important (though it is asking for a ransom on your grandma), but the underlying image is gorgeous.
